alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Seneca; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 6:01PM EDT until April 05 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Seneca County in central New York... Southern Cayuga County in central New York... Northern Tompkins County in central New York... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 600 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kidders, or 15 miles northeast of Dundee, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Groton, Covert, Locke, Genoa, Ledyard, Trumansburg, Moravia, Sempronius, Ovid and Interlaken. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
